description.@en: My blood stirs slowly, and I have to be cautious about everything I do. Should I push too much, I am afraid I’ll die in the worst of ways.

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: Whenever you fail to Resist against Stress, Fear or Terror, you gain 3 additional Conflict.
